There are so many AI art generators out there to use.

My first AI art generating app (5 free pieces of art per day): [https://www.starryai.com/](https://www.starryai.com/) 
 
Images in : img/starryai/
 
![solarpunk](img/starryai/s1.png)![solar panel satellite](img/starryai/s3.png)![pluto](img/starryai/s11.png)![spaceship flying down the sidewalk](img/starryai/s10.png)![Hydraulic dam fairytale](img/starryai/s7.png)![the storm rolled in](img/starryai/s2.png)![I believe in a thing called love](img/starryai/s8.png)
 
 
Doesn't require log in (5 free pieces of art per day, however using incognito mode or edge counts as a separate user for 15 pieces of art per day): [https://creator.nightcafe.studio/](https://creator.nightcafe.studio/)
